text: The Concorde... Airport '79 is a 1979 American thriller movie directed by David Lowell Rich and is the final movie in the Airport franchise. It stars Robert Wagner, Alain Delon, Susan Blakely, Sylvia Kristel, George Kennedy, Eddie Albert, Bibi Andersson, Ed Begley Jr., Harry Shearer, Cicely Tyson and Sybil Danning and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was a box office failure. The Concorde... Airport '79 was released on August 17, 1979. ==Related pages== * Airport * Airport 1975 * Airport '77 ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by David Lowell Rich Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C.
